The View Menu

The View menu allows you to quickly toggle some of the main visible components in RText. It contains the following menu items:


Action What It Does
Toolbar Toggles the visibility of the toolbar.
Status Bar Toggles the visibility of the status bar.
Source Browser Toggles the visibility of the source browser.
Line Numbers Toggles the visibility of line numbers in the text documents.
Document Properties... Displays a dialog showing properties for the current text document.

See also: The Menu Bar
